title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so initially. Instead, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This behavior occurs consistently and can be observed every time the outline view is accessed.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view

Observed Behavior: Any attempt to select an item in the library outline view results in the focus being automatically shifted to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The user should be able to select any item in the library outline view without the focus being redirected to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view
